subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! 17 Injuries Reported In Virgina Tech Rampage
body:
A hospital spokeswoman reports that 17 Virginia Tech students have been 
treated for gunshot wounds and other injuries. At least one person is dead.

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
